attributes.action: insist only bio-degradable products are used in mass balloon releases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see a reduction in the amount of unnecessary materials released in our cities and the country-side, without hindering people's enjoyment and charitable events. Therefore we requests that the use of foil and plastic products are stopped in favour of 100% bio-degradeable products used in mass balloon releases.
